content: Hello, thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services! How can I assist you today? Are you needing help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Yeah, my AC isn't cooling like it should. Not sure I want anyone coming out yet, though.
I'm sorry to hear your AC isn't working properly! If you'd like, I can help schedule a technician to take a look. May I have your name to get started?
Can't you just tell me if it's even worth fixing first? I don't want to waste time if it's just going to cost a fortune.

I understand your concerns about costs. We can provide a general price estimate for common AC issues, though exact pricing may depend on the problem. Would you like an estimate, or would you prefer to describe the issue in more detail?
If you give me a price and it turns out to be more, I won't be happy. Why doesn't anyone ever just tell the truth? Last company promised one thing, charged another.

We strive to be as transparent as possible. While I can only offer a range for repairs without an inspection, our technician will provide an upfront quote before any work begins. If you'd like, I can help you schedule a no-obligation diagnosis. Would that work for you?
I'm not giving my info out until I know this isn't another scam. You charge for just showing up, right?

There may be a standard service call fee, but I can get you the exact details depending on your location. No work will be done without your approval of the cost. May I provide general information about our fees?
I've heard all this before. Doesn't matter what you say, someone always finds a way to charge more. I guess I'll just sweat it out for now.
reason: Customer unwilling to proceed or provide info.
